name: geluiden op een avond
description:
for a school assignment whe had to listen to the enviremont for 15 minutes.

we had to take note from where the sounds came from and had to present this experience in some creative way.  So I did what others from my class didn't and made walking sim from it where you can see the space where I listenend. Here you can see wher the sounds came from. 

If you see some pink stuff, that is a glitch that I cant fix somehow.

only in dutch

only tested on pc. (if it works on mac you may let me know)

arrow keys to move, esc to exit the game
